snippet.title: Becoming Saint - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Becoming Saint is now available on Steam for your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2643010/Becoming_Saint

A political/strategic/tactical game where you are a heretic leader conquering towns, converting people to your rule, eventually getting burned at the stake but always becoming a saint!!!

Game developed by Open Lab,  published by Firesquid.

Trailer maker:
Open Lab Games & Kenny Chia, Player Two PR
